summary: meiro - Unlike his larger cousin Neiro, Meiro is just ​the right size to fit in a pocket, but his heart ​is as big as the moon. With his shiny, soft ​fur and twinkling eyes, Meiro brings joy ​wherever he goes. Legends say that anyone ​who meets Meiro will find their day ​instantly brightened, as his wagging tail ​and playful barks have the power to turn ​even the dreariest moments into a festival ​of laughter and happiness.
